sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"坚持"之意。
means: insist ： 通常用于对意见、主张等的坚持。
persist ： 用于褒义指坚持继续做某事，但更常用于贬义，指不听劝告，顽固坚持。
persevere ： 含褒义，强调坚持不懈的努力。
adhere与to连用，指坚持意见、计划或承诺等，含坚持不懈之意。
cling和to连用，指对信仰、意见、习惯等的坚持。

sentence.Network_en: They are determined to persevere in the fight.

sentence.Network_cn: 只要你坚持不懈,你自会成功.

sentence.Network_en: It took a generous helping of entrepreneurial confidence to persevere during this incident.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这一事件中坚持下来是有了充足的创业信心的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Esp词汇资料 ... konsist'i:to consist 由组成 persevere 坚持 8 rezist'i:to resist 抗拒 =.
英语成语大全 - 豆丁网 ... 千方百计 by every possible means 持之以恒 persevere 欣喜若狂 be wild with joy.
新概念英语二册Pers... ... insist on doing sth. 坚持做…… persevere v. 坚持，坚持不懈地努力(褒义词) perseverance n. 坚持不懈.

list.abs: 信念固着（belief perseverance）——信念可以独立存在，并且当支持其的证据被否定时仍然会存在下来。P75我们越是想极力证明我 …
perseveration 固着perseveration theory 持续论perseverative error 固着误差
...sports performance efficiency 运动效能运动效能sports perseverance 运动坚持性sports play 运动游戏
吸烟英语作文范文_英语四级作文_梦幻网络 ... 中国教育( China Education) 关于坚持( On Perseverance) 青年( Youth).
高中生英语作文范文大全 ... 真正的美- True Beauty 论毅力- On Perseverance 论自信- On Confidence.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French perseverer, from Latin perseverare 'abide by strictly', from perseverus 'very strict', from per- 'thoroughly' + severus 'severe'

entry.def: If you persevere with something, you keep trying to do it and do not give up, even though it is difficult.

example.ex: ...his ability to persevere despite obstacles and setbacks.
example.tran: 他锲而不舍、百折不挠的劲头儿

example.ex: ...a school with a reputation for persevering with difficult and disruptive children...
example.tran: 因对捣乱难管的学生不离不弃而闻名的学校

sentences.sentence: "he persisted to call me every night"
"The child persisted and kept asking questions"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 严厉的;剧烈的,严重的,严峻的,艰难的

stems_affixes.word_buile: as一再+sever诚恳+ate表动词→一再诚恳表示→郑重声明
per始终+sever诚恳+e→始终诚恳→坚持不懈

means.word_mean: 坚忍, 坚持,孜孜以求

sentences.en: Although he is in poor health, he still perseveres in his studies.
sentences.cn: 尽管他身体不好, 他仍孜孜不倦地学习。

jushi.english: Although he is in poor health,he still perseveres in his studies.
jushi.chinese: 尽管他身体不好，他仍孜孜不倦地学习。
